intension: Create an Instagram advertisement announcing the opening of a friendly and welcoming clinic. Include the clinic name, address, and website (snadrier.fr). Encourage people to prepare for the opening.
globalcaption: The image features a large blue and white balloon that is prominently displayed in the center of the scene. The balloon is positioned above a building, and it appears to be floating in the air. The background consists of a cloudy sky, which adds to the overall atmosphere of the image.
keywords: clinic, diagnostic, examination, healthcare, healthy, help, hospital, medical, medicine, ad, instagram, ig, insta, advertisement

bglayer.bgcaption: The image is a white background with a blue line running through it. The blue line appears to be a horizontal line, and it is positioned towards the top of the image. The rest of the background is predominantly white, creating a clean and minimalist appearance

objlayer.objcaption: The image features a blue and white balloon floating in the air, with a string attached to it. The balloon is positioned in the upper part of the scene, and it appears to be the main focus of the image. The background consists of a white sky, which contrasts with the vibrant colors of the balloon
